short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to help you in Flipkart, Amazon, Realme Flash Sale, Auto buy, Auto checkout features built-in.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FlashCart helps you to grab your favorite product in Flash sale by exclusively adding an add-to-cart switch on the Sale Page. 

- Works on Flipkart, Amazon, Realme store and all other major sites

- Auto checkout options available for Flipkart.

- Doubles the size of COD captcha for ease to read.

- Watch video for more information on how to use.
